text: Ralph Lee Abraham Jr. (born September 16, 1954), is an American politician, physician and former veterinarian who has been the Surgeon General of the Louisiana Department of Health since 2024. Abraham was the Republican United States Representative for from 2015 until 2021. Abraham unsuccessfully ran for Governor of Louisiana in the 2019 election. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Louisiana Category:American physicians Category:Scientists from Louisiana Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Veterinarians Category:21st-century American politicians
title: Ralph Abraham (politician)
